name: PVNP
description:
PVNP is a classic Sokoban style game that pays homage to the warehouse man himself but brings it into the 21st century. What once was man now is robot and the warehouse is now floating in the heavens. Explore your way through the different sections of the semi-open world as you get closer and closer to the end of the world.
Sokoban rules -
  • You can only move one block at a time.
  • You can't pull blocks.
  • You must move all of the cubes into an active spot.
Enjoy the unique custom music.
Explore your way through 50 puzzles.
See if you can master the game and get your number of steps as low as possible.

Controls
Keyboard And Mouse:
Move – WASD Keys
Pause – Press Escape Button
Quit - Press and Hold Escape Button

Xbox Controller:
Move – Left Joystick or DPad
Pause – Press Menu Button
Quit - Press and Hold Menu Button
